about_the_game:
This is the first version of Dallaham, which I hopefully expand and improve in the future.

Dallaham is a middle age city building game. You begin by building your first
settlement to attract citizens. If you satisfy their
needs and produce enough ressources, your city will grow and progress,
allowing you to unlock new buildings beginning from buildings of the
middle age towards the late industrial age.
Additionally buildings can expand, depending on the happinness of your people. To increase the number
of citizens, build parks and entertainment services in order to make them happy and
attract more of them.
A large map, tiling free building positioning and free camera movement
allow you to freely plan your customized city and fulfill your vision of how it should
look like!

Ressource management

Ressources, beginning with water and bread continuing over clothes to furniture, jewellery and more,
serve the needs of your citizens. Additionally, you need to produce stone, coal, bricks and other
building materials in order to build newer, larger buildings and expand your cities.
Building ressources can only be mined near corresponding deposits.

Tiling free construction

A large map with planes, forests, mountains and hills gives you much freedom to
plan your city. Tiling free construction of streets and building make sure, that you
are not limited to rectangular squares. Free camera movement allows you to visit your
city from the perspective of a pedestrian.

Unlock new buildings by expanding your city

You will progress through five development stages of your city from the
camp phase over the farm phase, middle age city phase, classical industrialized
phase towards the final stage of modern industrialized skyscrapers.

Dynamic expansion

Provide parks and entertainment buildings
in order to make your citizens happy.
Then their houses will dynamically expand
with higher happinness. This enables you to increase
the population density, the efficiency and the height
of your city.

Ressources, beginning with water and bread continuing over clothes to furniture, jewellery and more,

name: Dallaham

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core 2 Duo 3 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 896 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700 CPU
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Expand a small middle age village into an industrialized city with skyscrapers through the means of efficient ressource management. A large map, free building and camera movement allow you to watch everything in detail and build everything the way you want!
